title: TOWIE's Amber Turner and Dan Edgar during Halloween special
text:
Amber Turner and Dan Edgar risked messing up their spooky face paints as they passionately kissed during a break from filming on Sunday.

The couple joined the rest of the cast to film a TOWIE Halloween special and they really pulled out the stops.

Amber, 26, went braless under a sheer lace slip and flashed her underwear under the racy ensemble.

It's ghoul about you: TOWIE's Amber Turner went braless under a sheer lace slip as she posed with boyfriend Dan Edgar during filming for the show's Halloween special on Sunday

Spooky snog: The pair couldn't resist puckering up for a passionate kiss

She wore skeleton style face paint and added some further sex appeal to her look with a pair of over the knee boots.

A belt cinched her in at the waist as she posed for snaps with her man.

Dan, 29, looked a little awkward in his ensemble, opting to simply wear all black and trainers and wearing the same face paint as his girlfriend.

Dare to scare: Amber wore skeleton style face paint and added some further sex appeal to her look with a pair of over the knee boots

Skele-ton of love: Dan, 29, looked a little awkward in his ensemble, opting to simply wear all black and trainers and wearing the same face paint as his girlfriend

Amber's tumultuous relationship with Dan has been one of the main storylines in TOWIE for the past three years.

Last week, she spoke to MailOnline about the pressures of having her romance cast in the spotlight, admitting 'everyone is waiting for Dan to mess up'.

She spoke about how she felt his friends 'hated her', the drama in TOWIE and her new winter shoe collection with Envy.

Bridal: Amber was pictured walking around the venue with Yasmin Oukhellou

Close: The girls held hands as they made a big entrance together

Aisle be there for you: The girls had big smiles on their faces during fright night

Amber and Dan, 29, have endured a tumultuous romance, with Dan pursuing Clelia Theodorou and (earlier this year) Chloe Sims during breaks in their relationship.

Amber told MailOnline: 'We're completely fine. All couples have their rows.

'Obviously we have been through so much, people judge it and they’re like "break-up with him”. They’re waiting for Dan to mess up.

'When couples get back together in the normal world nobody knows about the arguments they have behind closed doors.

'But because it’s on TV everyone judges you way more.'
